karen is an almost constant internet user, utilizing it for work, social media, and online shopping. she and her family enjoy exploring the city, trying new restaurants, and taking weekend trips to the jersey shore. as a moderately active user of social media, karen follows news outlets, politicians, and family members on facebook and twitter.
